projectPurpose: To provide a trustless scaling solution and enhance privacy for the Ethereum blockchain using Zero-Knowledge Rollup technology, enabling higher transaction throughput and lower costs.
mainFeatures: Trustless scaling for Ethereum via ZK-rollups
Faster transaction finality compared to optimistic rollups
Reduced transaction costs and increased throughput

alternatives.name: Arbitrum
alternatives.license: Open Source (various components may have different licenses)
mainFeatures: Lower transaction fees than Ethereum L1

marketPositioning: zkSync is positioned as a leading Zero-Knowledge Rollup (ZK-rollup) scaling solution for Ethereum, emphasizing trustless security and faster transaction finality compared to optimistic rollups. With its focus on EVM compatibility in zkSync Era, it aims to attract existing Ethereum developers and applications, competing directly with other ZK-rollup implementations like StarkNet and indirectly with dominant optimistic rollups like Arbitrum and Optimism, as well as other scaling solutions like Polygon PoS. Its core value proposition lies in leveraging the cryptographic guarantees of ZK proofs for a highly secure and efficient scaling experience.
